sn42.5:4.1: Atha kho assāroho gāmaṇi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn42.5:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho assāroho gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.5:4.4: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ assārohānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.5:4.5: ‘yo so assāroho saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.5:5.2: tatiyampi kho assāroho gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.5:5.3: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ assārohānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.5:5.4: ‘yo so assāroho saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.5:6.5: Yo so, gāmaṇi, assāroho saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati tassa taṃ cittaṃ pubbe gahitaṃ dukkaṭaṃ duppaṇihitaṃ:
sn42.5:6.6: ‘ime sattā haññantu vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā ahesuṃ iti vā’ti.
sn42.5:6.7: Tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajito nāma nirayo tattha upapajjati.
sn42.5:6.8: Sace kho panassa evaṃ diṭṭhi hoti:
sn42.5:6.9: ‘yo so assāroho saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti, sāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi.
sn42.5:6.10: Micchādiṭṭhikassa kho panāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, purisapuggalassa dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi—
sn42.5:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, assāroho gāmaṇi parodi, assūni pavattesi.
sn42.5:7.5: “Nāhaṃ, bhante, etaṃ rodāmi yaṃ maṃ bhagavā evamāha.
sn42.5:7.6: Api cāhaṃ, bhante, pubbakehi ācariyapācariyehi assārohehi dīgharattaṃ nikato vañcito paluddho:
sn42.5:7.7: ‘yo so assāroho saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’”ti.
